name: Bar The Gates
description:
Get your friends together and fight to break their gates in a 2vs2 co-op battle!

Bar The Gates is a co-op base defense game where 2 teams can send extra minions to each other and try to break their gates. It is played on 1 keyboard with 4 players. Every team has 1 melee and 1 ranged member. There is friendly fire. When you stand on specially colored tiles and shoot, you may summon minions for the opponent team to fight. (only if you have enough points!)

Each player has 4 movement and 1 attack button as follows:
Team 1 Player 1: Numpad 8456 + Numpad 0
Team 1 Player 2: Arrows + Right CTRL
Team 2 Player 1: WASD + Left CTRL
Team 2 Player 2: IJKL + Space

Enjoy!
